programmes.show_description: Let the party begin. Huge feel good anthems & sing-out-loud classics - all from the decade of dance!
Girl Power! Boyband pin-ups, Britpop & High School Heroes! We're spending a whole week with the Smash Hits & Guilty Pleasures of the 1990s!
A little bit of love in the 90s from the likes of Take That, George Michael, Boyzone, Whitney Houston, Celine Dion and a load more.

programmes.show_name: Cuddle on the Couch - The Love 50
programmes.show_description: 4 hours of 90s love. What more could you ask for? We all need a cuddle on the couch every now and again.
Girl Power! Boyband pin-ups, Britpop & High School Heroes! We're spending a whole week with the Smash Hits & Guilty Pleasures of the 1990s!
Pat Man selects 30 chart toppers of the 90s that have probably slipped your mind! Expect lesser hits from Westlife, Geri Halliwell, All Saints & S-Club 7. Plus a Teletubby or 2.
Popcorn at the ready, these are NOW 90s' biggest songs from the movies. But don't forget to switch off your mobile phone!

programmes.show_name: The Opening Track from Every NOW!
programmes.show_description: A look back at the opening tracks from all the 90s NOW albums - from Erasure on NOW 17 to Britney Spears on NOW 44.
Girl Power! Boyband pin-ups, Britpop & High School Heroes! We're spending a whole week with the Smash Hits & Guilty Pleasures of the 1990s!
They came from nowhere, but left a lasting mark - sometimes good, and sometimes very bad! From Vanilla Ice & Right Said Fred to Scatman John & The Mike Flowers Pops!
Radio 1 legend Bruno Brookes returns with a countdown of the 40 biggest singles of the decade. Including 37 UK number 1s & big million-selling hits from Britney, Cher & Elton John.
Kick back and relax with some mellow moments. Chilled to perfection.

Every track a smash hit, every video a UK chart number one. What more could you possibly need in life?
Every track a smash hit, every video a UK chart number one in the 00s. What more could you possibly need in life!
Every existing video from the 40th NOW That's What I Call Music album - in order! Starting with Grease & ending with the classic Los Umbrellos... ending with what?
The standout chart music that defined the decade - from indie rock, singer-songwriters & girl bands to dance, R&B and the early emergence of UK garage & grime.
Oklahoma boys Isaac, Taylor & Zac choose 20 of their 90s favourites. Whitney Houston, Prince & Take That are all present - but standby for a few other surprises!
60 minutes of back-to-back number 1s from 2008. It was the year of the K, including Kanye West, Kid Rock, Katy Perry & Kings of Leon! With Mr Charts himself - Mark Goodier.
Loads of your favourite hits during the 00s were just cover versions of old songs for acts like Madonna, Girls Aloud & Adele, but can you recall who did the originals? Let's see!
From little monsters to global chart domination! Starting back in 2009, we celebrate the iconic music & artistry from the awesome 'Haus of Gaga'!
Danger! High Voltage! Prepare to go Bonkers with 30 of the silliest songs of the decade, including Cha Cha Slide, The Ketchup Song & My Humps. Warning: contains the Crazy Frog!
Popcorn at the ready, these are the biggest songs from the movies. But don't forget to switch off your mobile phone!
The 80s & 90s were the golden decades for movie songs - but there were still a few in the 00s - some well remembered, and some not! Here are 25, including 3 Bond themes.
Join us for a spectacular musical journey, a special video showcase highlighting the iconic Number One hits of one of Britain's most beloved pop bands, Take That!
